name: rails-conventions
description: Comprehensive Rails conventions plugin covering controllers, models, views, policies, jobs, migrations, Stimulus, testing, Hotwire (Turbo/Stimulus), ViewComponent, and 37signals-inspired patterns for CurrentAttributes, events, notifications, state resources, and multi-tenancy
instructions: When working in a Rails project, always load the appropriate rails-conventions skill before editing files. Never skip authorization in controllers. Prefer ViewComponents over helpers and partials.
